text: @JoeBiden Are YOU STUPID?? REOPEN? We haven't even hit the peak. You are so idiotic!! Failure to plan? Prepare? You are the one that called him a racist for shutting down travel to and from China. Hypocrite! We are far from reopening the country. We don't know enough about covid19.
